node.name: My RSE Extensions
node.shortdescription:
My RSE Extensions add some features to the Remote System Explorer.

This Eclipse plugin adds the following features to the Remote System Explorer:

  • Allow you to open a file by providing a file path.
  • Allow you to save the paths of the selected files/directories to the clipboard.
  • Allow you to backup/restore a file/directory.
node.body:
My RSE Extensions add some features to the Remote System Explorer.

This Eclipse plugin adds the following features to the Remote System Explorer:

  • Allow you to open a file by providing a file path.
  • Allow you to save the paths of the selected files/directories to the clipboard.
  • Allow you to backup/restore a file/directory.
